competitors.name: Cisco Systems
competitors.notes: Multinational technology conglomerate specializing in networking hardware

competitors.name: Check Point Software Technologies
competitors.notes: Israeli cybersecurity provider in firewall and network security

competitors.name: Juniper Networks
competitors.notes: Networking and cybersecurity company offering routers and firewalls

competitors.name: SonicWall
competitors.notes: Provider of comprehensive network security features

competitors.name: WatchGuard
competitors.notes: Network security provider offering firewall solutions

context: Fortinet was founded in 2000 by Ken Xie and Michael Xie in Sunnyvale, California. The network security market was dominated by established players like Cisco, Check Point, and Juniper Networks.
